message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper deals with pose estimation using computer vision techniques, which is a common topic in the computer vision sub-category (cs.CV). The paper specifically focuses on multi-perspective cameras, which are often used in robotics applications, making the robotics sub-category (cs.RO) another likely fit. The paper also proposes a closed-form solution, which involves mathematical modeling and optimization, making the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories possible fits. Finally, the paper involves geometric reasoning and optimization, which could also make the graphics (cs.GR) sub-category a possible fit.
